(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

29.brief: I am, exist, am in possession
29.long: I begin, am, exist, am in possession.
I practice, hold by custom; I deem, think, consider, suppose.
gold, anything made of gold, a gold coin.
a stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building.

29.brief: a man, one of the human race
29.long: a man, one of the human race.
like, similar to, resembling, of equal rank.

30.long: an untranslatable particle, generally answered by "de", each of the two introducing a clause intended to be contrasted with the other.
ignorance, inadvertence, sometimes with the idea of willful blindness.
I overlook, take no notice of, disregard.
adv. (a) of time: just now, even now; just at hand, immediately, (b) of logical connection: now then, (c) in commands and appeals: at this instant.

30.brief: I report, bring a report, announce
30.long: I report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare.

30.brief: a man, one of the human race
30.long: a man, one of the human race.

30.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
30.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
I repent, change my mind, change the inner man (particularly with reference to acceptance of the will of God), repent.

31.long: (a) in proportion as, according as, (b) because.

trans: (a) I make to stand, place, set up, establish, appoint; mid: I place myself, stand, (b) I set in balance, weigh; intrans: (c) I stand, stand by, stand still; met: I stand ready, stand firm, am steadfast.
a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
in, on, among.
who, which, what, that.
I intend, am about to; I delay, linger.
(a) I judge, whether in a law-court or privately: sometimes with cognate nouns emphasizing the notion of the verb, (b) I decide, I think (it) good.
the, the definite article.
(properly: the land that is being inhabited, the land in a state of habitation), the inhabited world, that is, the Roman world, for all outside it was regarded as of no account.
in, on, among.
(usually if not always in a Jewish atmosphere), justice, justness, righteousness, righteousness of which God is the source or author, but practically: a divine righteousness.
in, on, among.

31.brief: a male human being, a man
31.long: a male human being; a man, husband.
who, which, what, that.
I separate, mark off by boundaries; I determine, appoint, designate.
faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
act. and mid: I offer, provide, confer, afford, give, bring, show, cause.

31.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
31.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

31.brief: I raise up, set up, rise from
31.long: I raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear.

31.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
31.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

31.brief: from out, out from among, from
31.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse.

32.long: I hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported.

32.brief: but, on the other hand, and
32.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse.
an untranslatable particle, generally answered by "de", each of the two introducing a clause intended to be contrasted with the other.

32.brief: but, on the other hand, and
32.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported.

32.brief: again, further, on the other hand
32.long: again, back, once more, further, on the other hand.

33.brief: from out, out from among, from
33.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of.

33.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
33.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

34.long: any one, some one, a certain one or thing.

34.brief: but, on the other hand, and
34.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.

34.brief: a male human being, a man
34.long: a male human being; a man, husband.

34.brief: I glue, cleave, keep company with
34.long: (lit: I glue); hence: mid. and pass: I join myself closely, cleave, adhere (to), I keep company (with), of friendly intercourse.

34.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
34.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I believe, have faith in, trust in; pass: I am entrusted with.

34.brief: member of the Council of the Areopagus
34.long: member of the Council of the Areopagus, an Areopagite.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor.

34.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
